lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic spent 2015 relentlessly trampling on the hopes and dreams of would-be challengers and the world number one again looms as the reality check to their new season ambitions when the Australian Open gets underway on Monday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic spent 2015 relentlessly trampling on the hopes and dreams of would-be challengers and the world number one again looms as the reality check to their new season ambitions when the Australian Open gets underway on Monday....

headline.main: Djokovic Poised to Resume Global Domination
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Poised to Resume Global Domination
